name: Dangerous Neighbourhood
description:
NES inspired 2.5D  horror RPG  made for the Smile Game Builder summer Game Jam. 

This version has a fixed starting location so you can actually play the game.

Credits:

Design/Development/Art: James Collins.
Additional Animation: Alice Maclaurin, kiefKrack
OverWorld Tiles: Gavin Ashworth
Music:
OverWorld Music: https://soundcloud.com/7withoutthe11 
Sinister Ambiance: bitmapkid
Battle Music: Sqriations https://sqriations.wixsite.com/sqri
